Weapons.name: Rock
Weapons.description: A sizeable rock that can easily smash someone's skull in.

Weapons.name: Dagger
Weapons.description: A shiny dagger with some rust. Somewhat more dangerous than a rock.

Weapons.name: Sword
Weapons.description: An average sized sword. Deadly in the hands of a swordsman.

Weapons.name: Heavy Sword
Weapons.description: A large sword that requires two hands to swing

Weapons.name: Bow
Weapons.description: A huntsman's bow. Deadly at a range, useless at point blank.

Weapons.name: Crossbow
Weapons.description: Two handed crossbow. Deadly at all ranges. More effective at a larger range than a huntsman's bow.

Weapons.name: Handcannon
Weapons.description: A cannon that fits in your hand. Deadly. End. Of. Story.

Weapons.name: Krambit
Weapons.description: Small knife with a curved edge. Worth $262 with no skins. Lots of skins available. "Such skins, very wow"

Super Weapons.name: Sword of Dragox
Super Weapons.description: The sword of your father, Dragox. It hums with a mystical energy.

Super Weapons.name: Scepter of Romox
Super Weapons.description: The scepter of your father's father, Romox. Drips with poison.

Super Weapons.name: Umari of Fencor
Super Weapons.description: The umari of your uncle, Fencor. It is a whip with small daggers at the ends that is covered in blood. Hard to master.

Healers.name: Potion
Healers.description: A red potion that heals 50 hp. Single-Use only.

Healers.name: Full Potion
Healers.description: A orange potion that heals you to max hp! Single-Use only.

Healers.name: Life Potion
Healers.description: A potion with a gold color. Increases HP by 100.

Key Items.name: Cellar Key
Key Items.description: A small key to unlock a cellar.

Key Items.name: Torch
Key Items.description: A torch that lets you see in the dark. Somehow does not burn out.

Key Items.name: Book
Key Items.description: A book named "The History of the Skeleton King". Of no use to you.

Key Items.name: Great Oak Key
Key Items.description: A large diamond key that has a picture of the Great Oak on it.

Key Items.name: Note
Key Items.description: A note from your father. He hints about a Great Tree you where to find something that someone is missing. "It is vitally important" He explains.

Key Items.name: Jewel Egg
Key Items.description: A jewel-encrested egg. Surprisingly heavy for how small it is.

Key Items.name: Legendary Sword
Key Items.description: The sword of legend. Legend has it that when put through something into a hidden key hole, the passage to Shangri-La will be opened

Key Items.name: TriForce
Key Items.description: A triangle seperated by smaller triangles. The triangle in the middle is missing however, so there is a hole in it.
